com.raylabz.firestorm

Class FirestormTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raylabz.firestorm.FirestormOperation
      • com.raylabz.firestorm.FirestormTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.cloud.firestore.Transaction.Function<java.lang.Void>, OnCompletionListener, OnFailureListener, OnSuccessListener

    public abstract class FirestormTransaction
extends FirestormOperation
implements com.google.cloud.firestore.Transaction.Function<java.lang.Void>
    Enables Firestore transactions.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Nicos Kasenides

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        documentID - The object's document ID.

      • list

        public final <T> java.util.ArrayList<T> list(java.lang.Class<T> objectClass,
                                             int limit)
        Lists all objects of type objectClass as part of a transaction.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object (same with objectClass).
        Parameters:
        objectClass - The class of the object.
        limit - The maximum number of objects return.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of type T/objectClass.

      • listAll

        public final <T> java.util.ArrayList<T> listAll(java.lang.Class<T> objectClass)
        Lists ALL available documents of a given type. May incur charges for read operations for huge numbers of documents.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A type matching the type of objectClass.
        Parameters:
        objectClass - The type of the documents to filter.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of objects of type objectClass.

      • filter

        public final <T> TransactionFilterable<T> filter(java.lang.Class<T> objectClass)
        Filters objects of a certain type based on given conditions.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object (same with objectClass).
        Parameters:
        objectClass - The class of the object.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of objects of type T/objectClass, matching the provided filters.

      • updateCallback

        public final java.lang.Void updateCallback(com.google.cloud.firestore.Transaction transaction)
        Overrides method updateCallback() of the Transaction.Function interface. Initializes the transaction object used to carry out the transaction and then executes the transaction code provided by the developer.
        Specified by:
        updateCallback in interface com.google.cloud.firestore.Transaction.Function<java.lang.Void>
        Parameters:
        transaction - The transaction object.
        Returns:
        Returns null.
